definition.procedurexml:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="percent">percent</variable><variable type="Number" id="seconds">seconds</variable><variable type="Number" id="default_time_chance">default_time_chance</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="18" y="29"><field name="trigger">tooltip_event</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems_oredictionary"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">better_tools:flaming_armor</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:percent</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="get_attribute_whole"><field name="attribute">CUSTOM:FireThornsChance</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:seconds</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">DIVIDE</field><value name="A"><block type="get_attribute_whole"><field name="attribute">CUSTOM:FireThornsTime</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="75" w="355">set the value which appears for chance AND time, when no armor pieces are worn.
Time in seconds and chance as percent happen to be the same, when none are worn.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_dimensionids"><value name="a"><block type="entity_dimension_id"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="get_dimensionid"><field name="dimension">Nether</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:default_time_chance</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_ternary_op" inline="false"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" mark="false"></mutation><value name="condition"><block type="compare_mcitems_oredictionary"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">better_tools:nether_diamond_upgraded_crystallite_items</field></block></value></block></value><value name="THEN"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">15</field></block></value><value name="ELSE"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:default_time_chance</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_ternary_op" inline="false"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" mark="false"></mutation><value name="condition"><block type="compare_mcitems_oredictionary"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">better_tools:nether_diamond_upgraded_crystallite_items</field></block></value></block></value><value name="THEN"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><value name="ELSE"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="logic_ternary_op" inline="false"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" mark="false"></mutation><value name="condition"><block type="logic_negate"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">if the player is NOT wearing this armor piece, show DEFAULT stats</comment><value name="BOOL"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_get_armor_slot_item"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_get_armor_slot_item"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_get_armor_slot_item"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="THEN"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="3"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">if no armor pieces are worn, show single-piece benefit</comment><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§9+</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text_format_number"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">do not include any decimals here</comment><value name="number"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:default_time_chance</field></block></value><value name="format"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">##</field></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">% Fire
